name: Subnautical Hunter Mode
description:
After you draw 3 cards: Grants 1 Shield point to defend the attached character. (Can stack. Max 2 points.)
After the attached character uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill: Place up to 2 cards with the highest Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand at the bottom of your deck, then draw the same number of cards.
Duration (Rounds): 2

Max 2 points.)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the attached character uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill:</color> Place up to 2 cards with the highest Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand at the bottom of your deck, then draw the same number of cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
